spiritsExplanation: The 'Running Playlist 2025' features an explicit tempo range of 120-150 BPM and includes cues such as 'take your pace up gradually,' suggesting a structured workout ideal for pacing and progress tracking, which fits the 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit with a high confidence score of 0.8.
